metadata.name: Fireplace Vision 1
metadata.description:
What do you see when you gaze into the flames? This series depicts surreal and psychedelic collages of color, shapes, and figures hidden within one of the four basic elements. I find fire to be entrancing and am fascinated by its mystical and mysterious qualities. Change the way you see it, and who knows what youâ€™ll find.

Photograph taken by me and manipulated using Procreate.
